Title: Kearney Visual Standards
WhenToUse: When creating ANY visual element - charts, slides, dashboards, reports. Use for brand colors, typography, chart formatting, and layout patterns. Answers: 'How should this look?'

Title: TAM/SAM/SOM Market Sizing
WhenToUse: When a client asks 'How big is our market opportunity?' Use for business cases, investor pitches, market entry decisions, or growth strategy validation.

Title: Value Chain Diagnostic
WhenToUse: When a client asks 'Where is our margin leaking?' Use for cost structure analysis, profitability diagnostics, or operational efficiency benchmarking.

Title: Growth-Efficiency Matrix
WhenToUse: When you need to classify business units, products, or segments into strategic quadrants. Use for portfolio rationalization, resource allocation, or investment prioritization.

Title: Requirements Interview Guide
WhenToUse: When starting ANY new project and you need to gather complete requirements before analysis begins. Use to scope engagements, define success criteria, or clarify ambiguous client requests.

Title: Data Request Builder
WhenToUse: When you need to request data from a client or internal team. Creates precise, complete data specifications that get the right data the first time. Answers: 'What data do we ask for?'

Title: Analytical Methods Guide
WhenToUse: When you have data and need to determine how to analyze it. Covers method selection (regression, time series, segmentation, optimization) plus execution and interpretation guidance. Answers: 'How do we analyze this?'

Title: Insight Synthesizer
WhenToUse: When you've completed analysis and need to extract meaning. Master the 'So What?' skill. Transform data into actionable insights using the Insight Hierarchy, SCQA, and Pyramid Principle. Answers: 'What does this mean?'

Title: Slide Deck Builder
WhenToUse: When building a client presentation and need to structure the narrative. Covers story arcs, slide types, action titles, and deck flow. Answers: 'How do we tell this story?'

Title: Executive Summary Writer
WhenToUse: When you need to distill complex analysis into a 1-page summary for busy executives. Covers SCQA framework, word count targets, and prioritization. Answers: 'What's the TL;DR?'

Title: Setup Workflow
WhenToUse: When starting a new coding project and want AI to follow your preferred working style. Creates a CLAUDE.md or AI_INSTRUCTIONS.md that governs testing, commits, task management, and change approval.
Description: Interactive interview that generates customized AI workflow instructions for any coding project. Covers testing discipline, change approval, task tracking, and git commits.

Title: Hypothesis Tree Builder
WhenToUse: When you have a business question and need to structure your thinking before analysis. The #1 most valuable consulting skill. Transforms fuzzy questions into testable hypothesis trees with validation roadmaps.
Description: Build structured hypothesis trees with MECE sub-hypotheses, test criteria, data requirements, and kill criteria. The canonical consulting problem-solving tool.

Title: Issue Tree Decomposer
WhenToUse: When facing a complex, fuzzy problem and need to break it down into manageable pieces. Use before hypothesis building. Essential for case structuring and workplan development.
Description: Decompose complex problems into clean MECE issue trees with 3-4 levels of structured breakdown. Includes analysis mapping and prioritization guidance.
